hadiths.text: It was narrated from Mu'awiyah bin Qurrah that his father said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) sent me to a man who had married his father's wife after he died, to strike his neck (execute him) and confiscate his wealth.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ تَزَوَّجَ امْرَأَةَ أَبِيهِ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Marries His Father's Wife After He Dies.
